coded_answer.p: Thank you for your letter. I am very happy to have won your competition. In order to confirm my schedule for the traveltrip I have won in your competition, I am writing some information to you below.

I would like to go to "Camp California" onin July because I will have to produce "Mission Impossible III" from August. I will be busy to decidedeciding everything about this film and will not have enough time to go there.
I would prefer to stay in tents as a accommodation because it sounds thrilling and even ecstatic for me, and also I have never tried this kind of accommodation before.

I would like to choose Swimming and Tennis. To produce a film is very hard work. I must keep in a good condition to make a masterpiece. Swimming is really nice for my relaxing and I can do exercise for a long time. On the other hand, tennis stimulates my body and soul. It is good for my inspiration.
I don't have anything I would like to ask you. I look forward to going to go "Camp California".
How have you been? Hope you haven't been working too hard!
By the way, Dodo you want to hear about my experience aboutof the pop concert? OK! Here we go!

I enjoyed helping at a pop concert last month. There arewere a lot of people. I conveyedcarried a lot of chairs and looked after the quequeue or people who lost their way. It sounds really bad but I enjoyed this pop concert to my heart's content.

I like "X". "X" is the musician who sang songs at athe pop concert. My aim joining this concert as a member of stuffstaff was that I could see "X". I know you like "X" as well. Do you envy me? The concert was enthusiastic and even made me ecstatic. His voice is also soulful and sometimes even gave us blissful feelings. Sounds good, doesn't it?
Hope we join the next pop concert together as a stuffstaff and enjoy our time there!
